comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: This is identified as the 1914 Carlisle Indians football team, of the Carlisle Indian Industrial School in Carlisle, Pennsylvania, by a web page devoted to Bill Winneshiek, seated bottom row, third from left, and also known as NahiSonwahika. firstpeople.iwarp.com/phineus.html en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bill_Winneshiek The photos is marked "Hensel 14". Gustave Hensel had a studio in Carlisle.
